name: Mariusz Jan Skobel

Proficient in **coding best practices**, **testing**, and **deployment** processes, ensuring the delivery of secure and maintainable applications. Demonstrated expertise in **cybersecurity** and **infrastructure** management, with a commitment to continuous learning and professional growth in modern technologies. Strong collaboration abilities that enhance **frontend collaboration** and drive technical innovation within teams. Successful team guidance and mentorship with a focus on feedback culture and development process improvement. Excels in building cloud-native applications utilizing **FastAPI** and deploying solutions in **Azure** and **AWS**, while maintaining compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about integrating **AI/ML capabilities** into solutions that deliver meaningful real-world impact.
